toolSelector.projectDesc: Click to select a project folder

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure SkillHub Desktop
settings.toolsDescription: Re-scan your system to detect AI coding tools
settings.aboutDescription: Manage AI coding skills across all your tools from one place. Browse, install, and sync skills between Claude Code, Cursor, OpenCode, and more.

memory.name: Memory (CLAUDE.md)
memory.description: Personal preferences applied to all projects

claude.directoriesDesc: Manage your personal Claude Code configuration at
claude.personalSkillsDesc: Skills available across all your projects
claude.personalRulesDesc: Modular rules that apply to all projects
claude.aboutSkills: Skills teach Claude how to do specific tasks. They're automatically discovered and applied when relevant.
claude.aboutRules: Rules are modular, topic-specific instructions (e.g., code style, testing conventions).
claude.aboutMemory: Memory (CLAUDE.md) stores your personal preferences that apply to all projects.
claude.learnMore: Learn more about Claude Code configuration
claude.noProjectsDesc: Add a project folder to manage its Claude Code skills

settings.noToolsDetected: No AI coding tools detected. Click refresh to scan again.

create.title: Create Skill
create.subtitle: Create a custom skill for your AI coding tools
create.aiGeneratorDescription: Describe what you want your skill to do, and our AI will help you create it.
create.skillDescription: Skills are markdown files that provide instructions to AI coding assistants. They help the AI understand how to perform specific tasks like code review, testing, documentation, and more.
create.shortDescriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of what this skill does
create.editorHelp: Edit on the left, preview on the right. Click "Generate Template" to start with a basic structure.

aiDialog.title: AI Skill Generator
aiDialog.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., A skill that helps generate TypeScript React components with proper types and hooks...
aiDialog.descriptionHelp: Be specific about what you want the skill to do, include examples if helpful.
aiDialog.minChars: Please describe your skill in more detail (at least 10 characters)

searchDialog.pressEnter: Press Enter to search on Discover page

installed.title: Skills Manager
installed.subtitle: Manage skills installed on your system
installed.noSkills: No skills installed for this tool
installed.noTools: No AI coding tools detected on your system
installed.noToolsHint: Install Claude Code, Cursor, or other supported tools to get started
installed.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall "{{name}}"?
installed.confirmBatchDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} skills? This action cannot be undone.
installed.projectSkillsDesc: Skills installed in specific project directories
installed.noProjectsDesc: Add a project folder to manage its skills

sync.title: Sync Skills
sync.subtitle: Copy skills between tools or compare differences
sync.needTwoTools: You need at least 2 tools installed to sync

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.subtitle: Skills you've saved on SkillHub
favorites.signInDesc: Sign in with your SkillHub account to sync and manage your favorite skills.
favorites.visitSkillHub: Visit SkillHub to discover and save skills.
favorites.noToolsDetected: No AI tools detected. Please install one first.
favorites.noSkillContent: This skill has no installable content.
favorites.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.

collections.title: Collections
collections.subtitle: Your curated skill collections from SkillHub
collections.signInDesc: Sign in with your SkillHub account to sync and manage your skill collections.
collections.visitSkillHub: Visit SkillHub to create skill collections.
collections.noToolsDetected: No AI tools detected. Please install one first.
collections.noSkillsInCollection: This collection has no skills to install.
collections.noSkillContent: This skill has no installable content.
collections.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
